title: Hackers attack People’s Energy’s customer database
lead: The attack has reportedly affected 270,000 customers

title: Undersea electricity cable linking Western Australia and Tasmania secures AUD$93m grant
lead: A 1,500MW undersea electricity cable will connect Burnie in North West Tasmania and the Latrobe Valley in Victoria

title: Merry Christmas and best wishes for the New Year!
Global wind and solar capacity to ‘surpass that of gas by 2023’
lead: Global investment in renewables will bounce back in 2021, rising 8.5% to $255 billion, according to a new report

title: No Net Zero? What?
lead: So, you haven’t got an energy and sustainability strategy or plans to meet a net zero target? Don’t worry, you aren’t alone… and we’re here to help!

title: Scottish Water to install £2m solar and storage facility at wastewater plant
lead: The renewable energy generated is forecast to provide around a quarter of the electricity needed to treat water at site

title: Almost 2m eligible low-income households ‘lost out on Warm Home Discount in 2020’
lead: A new report found the fixed available budget and the ‘first come, first served’ nature of the scheme are the main reasons for a £325 million shortfall

title: Jaguar Land Rover invests in blockchain tech firm
lead: The luxury car manufacturer intends to use blockchain to trace sustainable supply chain

title: New £150m world record-breaking Humber pipeline delivering gas for National Grid
lead: The Humber Tunnel can transport between 70m to 100m cubic metres – or around a quarter – of Britain’s gas

title: Nearly 75% of Brits ‘find it difficult to find a registered contractor for Green Homes Grant’
lead: Almost 86% of homeowners and landlords rate their experience with the Green Homes Grant as either poor or very poor, according to a new survey
